ing: 1 Granny Smith apple - peeled, cored and diced
des: "This is a recipe we created one night when we wanted a salad for dinner, but were all out of standard salad ingredients.  It worked out wonderfully, and is something that we'll definitely make again."
ins: In a medium bowl, toss together mango, Granny Smith apple, cashews, balsamic vinegar, cinnamon, ginger, and salt.
